nodes.text: Idaflor was an astronomical object which was uninhabited by the time of the Imperial Era. While on the run from the Galactic Empire, the clone commandos of the Bad Batch considered using Idaflor as a safe place to hide away. Ultimately, the subject was tabled when the team decided to make port on the moon Pantora to replenish supplies and scramble their ship's magnetic signature, as they did not have enough fuel to reach Idaflor.
Idaflor first appeared on a computer screen in the Star Wars: The Bad Batch episode "Cornered," which premiered on Disney+ on May 21, 2021.
